short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate BPM based on click speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎶 Simple BPM Clicker 🎶

Tap your way to the beat of any song to get an estimated bpm value! 
Best of all; it doesn't judge you if you're off-beat (we've all been there) 🥁🎧

Not feeling the tempo? Whip it into shape by doubling or halving the BPM with the quick-fix buttons! ⏫⏬

From House to Dubstep, the smart genre indicator will guess the groove you’re tapping to. Is it always right? Nope. Is it fun to see what it comes up with? Absolutely. 🕺💃

Download now and tap into greatness! 🚀
